Game.Name: Touch Down Fever (Japan)
Game.plot: Touch Down Fever is a Sports game, developed by SNK and published by K Amusement Leasing,which was released in Japan in 1988.Cheat: Formation DebugDuring gameplay, when in the formation select mode, press Select to pause the game, then press and hold Select on Controller 1. While holding this button, press B on Controller 2 to toggle the formation index display on and off.
Game.Notes: Touchdown Fever is an arcade football game from SNK. Go head-to-head against the computer or a human opponent, or team up with another human player vs. the computer. Choose five, ten, or fifteen minute quarters for either league match (single game) or tournament play.
